pages.text: A mystical tool for Blood Magic altars and rituals. The Sanguine Diviner helps you build Blood Magic altars and manage rituals by showing information and assisting with structure management.

pages.title: Altar Usage
pages.text: $(bold)Check Altar:$()$(br)Right-click a Blood Altar to display:$(li)Current blood level$(li)Total capacity$(li)Current tier$(br2)$(bold)Show Ghost Blocks:$()$(br)Ghost blocks appear showing where to place runes and crystals for the next tier upgrade.$(br2)$(italic)Ghost blocks display for 10 seconds with a fade-out effect.$()

pages.title: Auto-Placement
pages.text: $(bold)Sneak + Right-Click Altar:$()$(br)Automatically places upgrade blocks from your inventory!$(br2)$(bold)Creative Mode:$()$(br)Auto-places all blocks without consuming them.$(br2)$(bold)Survival Mode:$()$(br)Places blocks you have, highlights what's missing.$(br2)$(italic)Ghost blocks update to show remaining positions after placement.$()

pages.title: Ritual Management
pages.text: $(bold)View Ritual Info:$()$(br)Right-click a Master Ritual Stone to display:$(li)Ritual name$(li)Active/Inactive status$(li)Ritual owner$(br2)$(bold)Dismantle Ritual:$()$(br)Sneak + right-click a Master Ritual Stone to safely dismantle the ritual without destroying the structure.$(br2)$(italic)A quick way to reset rituals!$()

pages.title: Features Summary
pages.text: The Sanguine Diviner provides:$(li)Ghost block visualization$(li)Auto-placement assistance$(li)Altar tier information$(li)Blood level monitoring$(li)Ritual information display$(li)Safe ritual dismantling$(br2)Essential for managing Blood Magic!$(br2)$(italic)Divine your path to power.$()
